effect.diamond_pearl: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.platinum: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.platinum: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.
flavor_text.platinum: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.
